{"id":1008282520,"question_id":525,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1690786793,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"23 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1008282520/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"55 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findMaxLength(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        map.put(0,-1);\n        int max = 0;\n        int cur = 0;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            \n            if(nums[i]==1)\n                cur++;\n            else\n                cur--;\n            \n            if(map.containsKey(cur)){\n                max = Math.max(max, i-map.get(cur));\n            }else\n                map.put(cur, i);\n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        return max;\n        \n        \n        \n    }\n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
